CRW_Copperhead |guid = da8d4507-0a08-44a3-bf96-4ad0980aca1a }} '''Copperhead''' is a character and a recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|The man before you - or creature, perhaps, as his skin is as grayed and withered as that of the other patrons- wears a helmet two sizes too large for him. It tips from side to side as his head moves.}} Copperhead is a minor dargul with a not-quite-perfect enchantment placed upon him. Copperhead believes that everyone in town is under the illusion that they are living kith. Somehow the helmet he salvaged blocks the magic, which appears to emanate from the top of the crypt at the center of town. He lives in the [Boathouse](/boathouse/) on the eastern side of the Splintered Reef, a makeshift home where he displays the collection of odds and ends that he's spent years accumulating, mostly as salvage from the shipwrecks on the reef. Copperhead's best find was the copper helmet from which he earned his nickname, and the grim knowledge of his existence as a gul. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = * [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = * With [Perception](/perception/) 15, you can ask him about the runes on the foreheads of all the gul's in the tavern. |crew = {{crewrank|2|navigator}}
{{crewrank|2|deckhand}} }} ## =Quests = * [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/): Starts the quest. He asks you to set the vessels free - and you can hire him as a crewman at the end of the quest. ## Gallery portrait_copperhead_sm.png | Copperhead's crew portrait [Category:Splintered Reef characters](/categorySplinteredReefCharacters/)
